summary: The script is a reference implementation for training a Text‑to‑Image adapter model on top of Stable Diffusion XL. It sets up argument parsing, prepares a training dataset, preprocesses images and prompts, computes text embeddings, configures the diffusion scheduler and optimizer, runs a distributed training loop with Accelerate, periodically validates the model by generating sample images, and saves checkpoints and model cards to the Hugging Face Hub.
business_intent: To provide developers with a ready‑to‑use example that enables them to fine‑tune custom adapters for SDXL, allowing integration of specialized visual styles or concepts into text‑to‑image generation pipelines for commercial or research applications.
